JOB DESCRIPTION: Change the future with us!      Required to work on Test Automation Framework Development, Test Case Execution, Test Report generation and distribution   Responsible for the Development and Execution and Maintenance of test automation scripts for a product   Develop, execute and maintain Automation Test Suites for Functional and Performance Tests   Requirement analysis, design and delivery of the test automation suite   Create efficient and effective test datasets for system, smoke and performance testing   Coordinate and set up the test environments for different types of tests, which involves configuration the product under test     Use your skills to move the world forward!      Experience: We need a BE/ MTech/ ME (EC, CS, EE) graduate with 3 years of total experience in Software Development and Test Automation.   Expertise in programming with Object Oriented Language preferably C# with .NET Framework 3.5 or higher   Strong analytical and debugging skills   Expertise in Test Automation Library creation   Generic knowledge on network, Web services and IT tools   Preference if experience with Industrial Automation Domain   Experience in Ranorex test automation framework would be a plus
